mapper.select: /* ReservationMessageSendDAO.reservationMessageList */ select a.message_no , a.title , a.group_yn , a.hakwon_no , a.send_user_no , a.reservation_date , a.message_type , a.message_target , c.user_type as send_user_type , b.user_name as send_user_name , (select concat(device_token, '|', device_type, '|', is_production) from tb_login_hist where user_no = a.send_user_no and device_token is not null order by login_date desc limit 1) as send_user_device from tb_message a , tb_user_info b , tb_user c where a.reservation_yn = 'Y' and a.reservation_send_date is null and a.reservation_date <= now() and a.send_user_no = b.user_no and a.send_user_no = c.user_no order by a.message_no asc

/* ReservationMessageSendDAO.receiverUserDeviceList */ select b.receive_user_no as user_no , c.device_token , c.device_type , c.is_production from tb_message_receiver b , tb_login_hist c where b.message_no = #{message_no} and b.receive_user_no = c.user_no and c.device_token is not null order by c.device_type
mapper.update: /* ReservationMessageSendDAO.messageSendDone */ update tb_message set reservation_send_date = now() , send_date = now() where message_no in (${messageNos})
